name: lufin
description: Lufin is a lightweight open-source personal finance manager that allows users to track earnings, expenses, budget categories, and generate simple financial reports through a web UI.
features: Expense Tracking: Record transactions, Categorize spending, Receipt management. Track where your money goes.
Income Management: Multiple income sources, Salary tracking, Revenue logging. Monitor all earnings.
Budget Planning: Set budget limits, Category budgets, Spending alerts. Stay within your financial goals.
Financial Reports: Spending analysis, Income vs expenses, Trend visualization. Understand your financial health.
Category Management: Custom categories, Subcategories, Flexible organization. Organize finances your way.
Multi-Currency: Currency conversion, Exchange rates, International support. Manage finances in any currency.
Data Export: CSV export, Backup data, Report generation. Keep your financial data portable.
Privacy-Focused: Self-hosted, No cloud tracking, Local storage. Your financial data stays private.
